mean_en: any small creature with six legs and a body divided into three parts. Insects usually also have wings. Ants, bees and flies are all insects.
sentence: There're many kinds of insects, such as butterflies, bees and ants.
sentence_trans: 昆虫有很多种类，例如蝴蝶、蜜蜂和蚂蚁。
word_etyma: in进入 + sect切，割 → 昆虫一节一节如被切开一样 → insect昆虫
